subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The struggling Yankees starter Vidal Nuno, who gave up three home runs in a loss to the Orioles, is pitching for his job “every time, every outing, every inning.”
snippet: The struggling Yankees starter Vidal Nuno, who gave up three home runs in a loss to the Orioles, is pitching for his job “every time, every outing, every inning.”
